channel.title: Stan C++ on Juho Timonen
channel.description: Recent content in Stan C++ on Juho Timonen

item.title: Understanding the Stan codebase - Part 1
item.description: Introduction So, you have your Stan model written and are doing inference for it, but something weird is happening? Or maybe you want to extend Stan but don’t know where to start because the source code repositories look daunting. These are some of the possible reasons why someone might want to study the internals of Stan, and what is happening under the hood. I have for various reasons for a long time wanted to just see what is happening line-by-line.
